=== Plans for 8.10 ===

Place in this section bullet points of specific intended outcomes for the 8.10 development cycle.

=== Sessions ===

* Single Sign On Requirements: DestopTeam/IntrepidSingleSignOnRequirements
* Single Sign on User Experience: DestopTeam/IntrepidSingleSignOnUserExperience
* Single Sign on Authentication: DesktopTeam/IntrepidSingleSignOnAuthentication
* Single Sign on Integration: DesktopTeam/IntrepidSingleSignOnIntegration
* Compiz in Intrepid: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DesktopTeam/Specs/InrepidDesktopEffects
* Hardy -> LTS+1 upgrades: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LTSUpgrades
* Get rid of linux-meta, support more kernel driver packages: DesktopTeam/Specs/KernelAbiPackageHandling
* Stop (ab)using system groups for device permissions: DesktopTeam/Specs/Intrepid/DevicePermissions
* Consolidate Spell Checkers: ConsolidateSpellingLibs
* Add support for printer drivers to Jockey: DesktopTeam/Specs/JockeyPrinterDriverSupport
* Provide a guest session account by default: DesktopTeam/Specs/Intrepid/GuestAccount
* "Login Experience" (aka GDM face-browser)
** goal is to provide a graphical rich greeter for the new GDM
** see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DesktopTeam/Specs/GdmFaceBrowser
** new visual design put forth by Mark during UDS-Prague (mockups don't reflect current goal anymore)
** high priority
* "Spit & Polish"
** small visual tweaks here and there
** fix annoyances in GTK+, widgets, theme-engine, dialogs
** see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DesktopTeam/Specs/SpitAndPolish
** low priority
* "CoverFlow for rhythmbox" (aka sparkle-plugin)
** side project started during the Hardy-cycle
** see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/DesktopTeam/Specs/HardySparkle
** depending on available spare-time I will try to continue to work on it
** low priority
